snippet: A soldier who shot and killed his commanding officer and wounded another soldier before shooting himself at Fort Bragg last week has died, military officials said Sunday.
abstract: Specialist Ricky G Elder, soldier who shot and killed his commanding officer and wounded another soldier before shooting himself at Fort Bragg, NC, dies of his injuries; the officer Elder is accused of killing is identified as Lt Col Roy L Tisdale.
lead_paragraph: A soldier who shot and killed his commanding officer and wounded another soldier before shooting himself at Fort Bragg last week has died, military officials said Sunday.

headline.main: Gunman in Fort Bragg Shooting Dies
headline.print_headline: Gunman in Fort Bragg Shooting Dies

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
